name: FlameBoss
0:
”Alexa, ask Flame Boss how's my cook”
”Alexa, ask Flame Boss for the meat temperature”
”Alexa, ask Flame Boss to change the set temperature”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flame boss
Developer Terms of Use
des: Get the temperature of your smoker or the internal temperature of the meat being cooked, or change the set temperature of your smoker. Requires a Flame Boss smoker controller.
